alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 6:03AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Nance and northern Merrick Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 603 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belgrade, or 35 miles northeast of Grand Island, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fullerton around 610 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Genoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
